title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item.
EB: The format of datetime values retrieved from the table should be the same in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
1. Enter new Date() as the content for all three items.
2. Save the changes.
3. Preview the items.

Expected Result:
The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in all three items.

Actual Result:
The datetime values are displayed differently in the dynamic text item compared to the data/text item.
